bench

Interface ICoach

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bench

    public interface ICoach
    Coach interface of Bench instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void callContestants(java.lang.String team)
      In coach life cycle, transition between "wait for referee command" and "assemble team".
      void reviewNotes(java.lang.String team)
      In coach life cycle, transition between "watch trial" and "wait for referee command".
      void waitForAssertTrialDecision()
      The coaches will wait until the referee make the decision of notify the referees in the assertTrialDecision.
      void waitForCallTrial()
      The coaches are sleeping in this method waiting that the referee inform and can select the next team.
      void waitForFollowCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team)
      The coach will wait until the last contestant stand in position to then follow the coach advice.

    • Method Detail

      • reviewNotes

        void reviewNotes(java.lang.String team)
        In coach life cycle, transition between "watch trial" and "wait for referee command". The coach will wait until 10 contestants are in the bench and then will continue.
        Parameters:
        team - Team identifier, can be A or B.

      • callContestants

        void callContestants(java.lang.String team)
        In coach life cycle, transition between "wait for referee command" and "assemble team". The coach will select randomly the contestants, this will be the strategy, select random the contestants. The contestants will make one "pool" to see if they are in the array of the players selected.
        Parameters:
        team - Team identifier, can be A or B.

      • waitForCallTrial

        void waitForCallTrial()
        The coaches are sleeping in this method waiting that the referee inform and can select the next team.

      • waitForAssertTrialDecision

        void waitForAssertTrialDecision()
        The coaches will wait until the referee make the decision of notify the referees in the assertTrialDecision.

      • waitForFollowCoachAdvice

        void waitForFollowCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team)
        The coach will wait until the last contestant stand in position to then follow the coach advice. The flags will be resetted.
        Parameters:
        team - Team identifier, can be A or B.
